meanings.definition: A group of insects that includes dragonflies and damselflies.
meanings.sent1: Dragonflies and damselflies are examples of odonates.
meanings.sent2: I saw an odonate flying gracefully over the pond.
meanings.sent3: Why did the dragonfly invite the damselfly to the party? Because they are both odonates!
meanings.sent4: The odonates danced in the air, their wings shimmering in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The pond was alive with the vibrant colors of the odonates.
